summary: A clerk at the same hotel since 18, 30 y.o. Matthew breaks the monotony when his favorite model, Hexina, secretly stays at the hotel. He impersonates a caller and goes on a date with her. Things get deadly.
cast: Arye Gross|Claudia Christian|Adrienne Shelly|Ray Baker|R. Lee Ermey|Michael E. Knight|Robin Curtis|Brandis Kemp|Norman Fell|Pamela Roylance|Billy Eugene Jones|John S. Davies|Fred Mata|Marilyn Staley|Julio Cesar Cedillo|Woody Watson|Randy Means|Phyllis Cicero|Tasha Auer|Terry Poland|Joe Berryman|Gil Glasgow|Jonathan Dorn|Erin Kempe|Mark Walters|Tony Brownrigg|Spencer Lucas|Bob Hess|Roy Metcalf|Francis Silmon|Alan Ackles|Suzanne Moss|Elaine Long|Linda Edwards|Maria Arita|Laura Banks|David Sederholm|Teresa Ganzel|Michele Russell|Geoff Garza|John William Galt|Gary Moody|Doug Small|Lisa E. Seyfert|Georgia Lambron|Irene Cortez|Ray Etheridge|Honey Gregory|David Harrod|Peyton Hayslip|Jim Henry|Vernon Reeves|Kate Rodger|Scott Roland|Alan Spencer|John B. Wells|Michael Roland Williams
title: Linda, loca y peligrosa
